mapper.select: select u.*,s.name school_name,s.province from (select * from tbl_user where name=#{name} and password=#{password}) u left join tbl_school s on u.school_id= s.id
select b.id,b.content,u.name,b.time from tbl_bbs b left join tbl_user u on b.user_id=u.id where b.rent_id=#{rent_id} order by b.time desc
